properties.entry: Congratulations for registering and activating your voucher

Please confirm your email address. Doing so ensures that no one else has registered with your email address. We already sent you a confirmation email. If you confirm it now your registration at Pairoo will be successfully completed.

As PAIROO Premium Member you can start right now with making contacts and flirting unlimited. Start your search for the partner of your dreams - now.

For your information we summarize your membership facts again.
When your voucher period expires your Premium membership will be converted into a free membership.
Start now making contacts and flirting as Premium member

The PAIROO Team wishes you good luck in flirting and contacting.

Kind regards

Your Pairoo Team
